Title: Se7en
Description: Two detectives track a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins.

Genre.Name: Psychological Thriller
Genre.Description: Focuses on paranoia, distorted reality, and the human mind.

Director.Name: David Fincher
Director.Bio: American director known for dark, stylish thrillers.

Title: Psycho
Description: A secretary embezzles money and encounters a mysterious motel owner.

Genre.Name: Psychological Thriller
Genre.Description: Focuses on paranoia, distorted reality, and the human mind.

Director.Name: Alfred Hitchcock
Director.Bio: English director, widely regarded as the Master of Suspense.

Title: The Birds
Description: A series of sudden, unexplained bird attacks plague a California coastal town.

Genre.Name: Supernatural & Paranormal
Genre.Description: Ghosts, demons, curses, hauntings, and unexplained forces.

Director.Bio: English director, widely regarded as the Master of Suspense.

Title: The Conjuring
Description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

Genre.Name: Supernatural & Paranormal
Genre.Description: Ghosts, demons, curses, hauntings, and unexplained forces.

Title: Insidious
Description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

Genre.Description: Ghosts, demons, curses, hauntings, and unexplained forces.

Director.Name: James Wan

Title: Parasite
Description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

Genre.Name: Psychological Thriller
Genre.Description: A subgenre of thriller that focuses on the mental and emotional states of its characters, often exploring themes of manipulation, deception, and social tension.

Director.Name: Bong Joon-ho
Director.Bio: South Korean filmmaker known for his darkly comedic and socially critical films

Title: Scream
Description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer who targets her and her friends using horror films as part of a deadly game.

Genre.Name: Slasher
Genre.Description: Violent, graphic movies featuring a killer hunting down victims.

Director.Name: Wes Craven
Director.Bio: Wes Craven was an American film director known for revitalizing the horror genre.

Title: Train to Busan
Description: Passengers on a train must fight for survival when a zombie outbreak occurs in South Korea.

Genre.Name: Zombie
Genre.Description: Movies about the undead, survival, and apocalyptic worlds.

Director.Name: Yeon Sang-ho
Director.Bio: South Korean director and screenwriter, known for animation and live-action films.

Title: 28 Days Later
Description: Survivors in London face chaos after a virus outbreak causes uncontrollable rage in humans.

Genre.Name: Zombie
Genre.Description: Movies about the undead, survival, and apocalyptic worlds.

Director.Name: Danny Boyle
Director.Bio: English director and producer, known for stylistic and innovative filmmaking.

Title: The Shining
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

Genre.Description: Focuses on paranoia, distorted reality, and the human mind.
